comments.body:
In https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/express-serve-static-core/index.d.ts#L34 the RequestHandler is defined as
`(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction): any;`
If this line has to be changed, I would vote for `any` as result type.

thanks for review.
In [express-graphql](https://github.com/graphql/express-graphql/blob/v0.6.12/src/index.js#L123) the `Middleware` returns `Promise<void>`, compatible with `RequestHandler`'s return value.
Of course `any` is safe, but should we follow the definition of `express-graphql`?
You're right. The definition should stick to the graphql-express rather than the general express types.
